item.title: Running python on JASMIN
item.description: On the JASMIN analysis machines and on Lotus, we support Python2.7 and Python3.7 through Jaspy. When you log in, the default version of Python is 2.

item.title: Running R on JASMIN
item.description: On the JASMIN sci servers and LOTUS, we support the use of R through the “jasr” environment(s), as listed on the Jaspy page.
